price: 83. Waxay gartaan Nicmadda Alle (Islaamka), haddana way dafiraan,  badankooduna waa gaalo.
arabic: يَعۡرِفُونَ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُنكِرُونَهَا وَأَكۡثَرُهُمُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yaʿrifūna niʿ'mata al-lahi thumma yunkirūnahā wa-aktharuhumu al-kāfirūna
